text:
![group_zmaps](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/634068/13346789/1dd4c692-dc69-11e5-9d35-21f605ef9a7e.png)

In the figure generated by `plot_prob_atlas`, It would be nice to know which color corresponds to which of the input 3D maps. This could be done on a legend plotted on a separate figure (and then merged ?), so as not to mess up the main figure.
title: Put legends in plot_prob_atlas
